QuestData.Title: The Citadel's Reach
QuestData.Description: Each day, Hellfire Citadel opens its gates, and more fel orcs pour out and into the camps they've established along the ramparts south of the fortress.$B$BI dispatched one of my most capable scouts, Private Imarion, to track their movements, preparations and numbers, but he hasn't returned to report his findings.$B$BImarion was to focus his efforts on the northernmost camp along the Southern Rampart, near where it joined the Citadel. Find him, $n. Without his information, we're sitting ducks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the northernmost camp along the Southern Rampart for any trace of Private Imarion.
